trans-unit.source: Make the app available in other contexts

target.mrk: 使应用在其他上下文中可用

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>Share on SAP Jam</uicontrol>: If an integration with the SAP collaboration tool SAP Jam is available for this app, you can share it or discuss its content in your SAP Jam groups.

seg-source.mrk: If an integration with the SAP collaboration tool SAP Jam is available for this app, you can share it or discuss its content in your SAP Jam groups.

target.mrk: 如果此应用可以与 SAP 协作工具 SAP Jam 集成，则您可以在 SAP Jam 组中共享此应用或讨论此应用的内容。

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>Save as Tile</uicontrol>: To retrieve frequently-used apps quickly, you can save them for direct access in the SAP Fiori launchpad.

seg-source.mrk: To retrieve frequently-used apps quickly, you can save them for direct access in the SAP Fiori launchpad.

target.mrk: 要快速检索常用的应用，可以在 SAP Foiri 快速启动板中保存这些应用以直接访问。

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>Send E-Mail</uicontrol>: Share the app information with stakeholders by sending them the link.

seg-source.mrk: Share the app information with stakeholders by sending them the link.

target.mrk: 通过向利益相关方发送链接来与他们共享应用信息。
